lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people so they can help themselves. I don't always trust the big organisations. Too much money goes into administration.
lender.occupational_info: I manage projects for a large danish company.

lender.name: RonnyK.
lender.loan_because: It`s a brilliant idea!!! Secondly, you can really see the difference it makes...!

lender.name: Tone
lender.loan_because: This makes the world a better place for someone:)

lender.name: Rein
lender.loan_because: It's right.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I live a privileged life in Canada, by world standards, and it hurts to see others suffering. So little (for us) could mean a world of difference to someone else. We are in this together. Not giving is not an option when I know how much it could mean to someone's life.

lender.name: Rune
lender.loan_because: I read an article in a norwegian newspaper about Kiva, and I've heard about these microloans from the articles about the Nobel Prize winner, Muhammad Yunus. I wanted to contribute, and I really hope these small loans will help other people create or grow their own business.
lender.occupational_info: Guiding airplanes and everything else that fly around safe and efficient to their destination.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: It is important to help if you have the opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: Potatoe

lender.name: Sindre
lender.loan_because: To help people develop their buisness/dreams. I also like this concept of peer to peer lending where I can directly see the benefits from half way around the world.

lender.name: Gabriela
lender.loan_because: This is not a loan. This is a helping hand to someone in this world. And then they will do the same. Isn't a start for a better wold?

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: People have helped me and now I'm in a place were I can help others.
lender.occupational_info: Chasing a 4 year old around and living my dream of chasing a 4 year old around.

lender.name: Hallvard
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites.

lender.name: Trine
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. We are all from the same planet, we should help each other more often.

lender.name: Tore
lender.loan_because: Curious to see if this can help...

lender.name: Ejvind
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling of empowering people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a laughter consultant. I teach people to become less stressed using laughter as the tool to release unwanted stress and feel better.

lender.name: Toril
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a little difference for somebody

lender.name: Silja
lender.loan_because: Because I have been in a situation where I needed help which I got. I would like to do the same to others.

lender.name: Lin
lender.loan_because: people need help and I am fortunate enough to help wherever I can.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to me -- if a $25 loan can help someone, then I it's great that I can be in the position to do so.

lender.name: Millie
lender.loan_because: There are people in need.

lender.name: Bernhard69
lender.loan_because: I don't like donate blindly. I want to support people who help themselves.

lender.name: Melonie
lender.loan_because: It makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college professor. I teach American Government to young students.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I promote high technology, such as computer software.

lender.name: Kuo Family
lender.loan_because: we want to provide opportunities to others.

lender.name: Beth & Sterlyn
lender.loan_because: My college professor introduced me to this and I was so touched. As a student I don't have much money. To know I can help someone and in the end it costs me nothing except a few moments of my time and a kind gesture is so rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I am in college to get my bachelors degree in business. I hope to have a management position some day.

lender.name: Kjersti
lender.loan_because: "Do ordinary things with extraordinary Love" Mother Teresa
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse. I live in Norway and have three children.

lender.name: Boris
lender.loan_because: I want to assist people, so they can help themselves in the future. This is - in my opinion - a very sustainable way to support developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: Developing websites and web applications.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: The leverage from the money loaned will have a far greater impact--hopefully for the better--than anything I could possibly have done here in the U.S.
lender.occupational_info: I provide classroom support to nursing professors at UCLA

lender.name: Storesund family
lender.loan_because: We belive this is the best way to help people.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: people deserve a living *and* dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature, history, and film at a university.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone that works hard and deserves support, doesn't matter where it comes from but it's got to be there.
lender.occupational_info: I make art and web pages.

lender.name: Allen & Susan
lender.loan_because: We feel fortunate in life and would like to do our part to help others in need.

lender.name: Rune
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that are in need.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I market and sell retail software products for medium to large businesses.

lender.name: Grethe
lender.loan_because: if it lets others have a chance at a better life, then my life will also be better.

lender.name: Katey
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to support their families, regardless of where they were born. I believe in love, because God is love.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help companies become more profitable by creating brochure, flyers, websites, etc.

lender.name: Kai Ivar
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because:
I feel very privileged to be born in a country like Austria. So I'd like to give people a chance who weren't that lucky from the start.
Also, I have seen with my own eyes what happens to people desperate enough to leave their home country, trying to get to Europe in search of a better life.
If I can make a contribution to someone so they can move on to develop their skills and stand on their own feet, a small but important change has been made. It may not be much, considering the world's many problems. But I am certain that my small contribution makes a lot of difference for this one person in need and for his/her family.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small travel agency, specializing in the Seychelles (some of the world's most beautiful islands).

lender.name: Little Green Wagon
lender.loan_because:
I believe in the power of paying it forward. Supporting the entrepreneurial spirit empowers a community to remain unique and whole.
$25 and you can be your own Warren Buffet.

lender.name: Dianne
lender.loan_because: I hope for change.

lender.name: Charity
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of real people.

lender.name: Jan-Erik
lender.loan_because: I care!!
lender.occupational_info: General manager for a company that sell Automatic External Defibrillators and train people in school, kindergarden and company´s to use them.

lender.name: Helge Egil
lender.loan_because: It's a great way of helping :)

lender.name: Tarjei
lender.loan_because: Its a good thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Research Administration

lender.name: Adeel
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Henriette
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: John Tore
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a change.

lender.name: Sondre
lender.loan_because: I think that we all have an obligation to help others if we are in a position to do so! Help people to help themselves! =)

lender.name: Tore
lender.loan_because: I like to think that I am doing something good for others by doing this.

lender.name: konami
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become more sustainable in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work in education assisting students obtain their degrees so that they can make a difference in their communities.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: A little can help a lot!

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I work with vocational education of adults.

lender.name: Northside Economics
lender.loan_because: We are a collection of AP Microeconomics students who attend Northside College Prep High School in Chicago, IL. We have examined the Nobel Prize winning work of Muhammad Yunus. Kiva's innovative infrastructure -- which enables thousands to function as bankers to the poor -- provides a powerful extension of Yunus' life's work.
lender.occupational_info: We are students who strive to move beyond the four walls of our classroom.

lender.name: Ruben
lender.occupation: CTO of a Telecom Solution Developer company
lender.loan_because: I like the direct and concrete approach on where my money is going. Compare this to certain Norwegian aid-organizations where only a small percentage (10% - 40%) is actually going to aid, the rest is spent on "administrative issues".
lender.occupational_info:
My work is about making communication between people possible with new and cheaper technology.
VoIP is going to make a huge impact on the way people in developing countries will communicate with each other in the future.

lender.name: Dag Robert
lender.occupation: Being a little boy, working in kindergarden
lender.loan_because: My mum and dad has given my weekly allowance to people who need it more than me. I like to help people to get a better life, and give my small contribution.
lender.occupational_info:
Update: moved to north of Norway, to Hammerfest. Still busy. My favourite toy now is snowscooter. Looking forward to try one when snow comes.
Update: I just celebrated my 2 years birthday. I`ve learned to talk a little bit. Still busy working in kindergarden, which I think is very fun.
Update: Now I`m 1,5 years old. I`ve learned go walk and now the world is open for me :-). I`ve also got my first job going to kindergarden, that`s fun. I enjoy it very much.
Update: Now I`m 9 months old, I`ve just learned to crawl and stand up. Now my parents are more busy keeping things out of my hands.
Original text: Due to that I`m only 4 month`s old my full days work is eating and sleeping for the time beeing.

lender.name: Philosophy Texas State
lender.loan_because: We believe we are all sharing the same journey through time and space and we want to empower our fellow travelers.
lender.occupational_info: We teach philosophy at a State University in Texas

lender.name: Oivind
lender.loan_because: I am able to help a little

lender.name: Tor-Odd
lender.loan_because: I do hope that I help to make a difference to the people I give a loan

lender.name: Cybertom
lender.loan_because:
By making such small amounts available to people in need, i am not only giving these people a chance to give themselves a better life - but also their family and their community. Helping them to build a future in their own environment is the future!
So instead of eating out tonight, I invested USD 25,- in someones life, hoping that the people I invest in and believe in, will be able to create a future in their own environment. AND, I recommend everyone else to do the same!

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the fact that I'm not giving to a faceless organization, I'm giving to a person.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I believe this is one of the best ways to empower our neighbors, giving them opportunities to become economically independent, improve their standard of living, and alleviate poverty for themselves and their communities. (Kiva's mission statement)
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant to a broker at AG Edwards (an investment firm). I answer phones and prepare documents for meetings with clients.

lender.name: Thomas, Marion und Lea
lender.loan_because: I think that is the right way to help people without take them their own initiative
lender.occupational_info: i work in a city-hall of a town with 50.000 people. I am a teacher for computers and software for the other comrades in the city-hall.

lender.name: ContraCostaChristianHS
lender.loan_because: We believe God has called us to serve & help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: We are a Christian School for Christian families.

lender.name: Cozumel
lender.loan_because: Many people have helped me in life, so I want to pass the help on. I grew up in Mexico and am all too familiar with small business that need a lifeline for the short run. I loan because I can at the moment.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish (Language and Literature) and Women's Studies at a large university. In women's studies I look at the impact tourism has on women's lives - for better or for worse, among other things.

lender.name: Atle
lender.loan_because: I believe in this concept. Helping people to help themselves makes sense.

lender.name: Stein
lender.loan_because: I believe people will succeed and prosper when given the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Financial advisor

lender.name: Scribetrotter
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer and communicator on development issues.

lender.name: Espen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to build a business and enable help them to make a living for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Creating software mostly in some way related to the Internet.

lender.name: Nils Arve
lender.loan_because: It is a good way to help other people

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Folke
lender.loan_because: I am fascinated by the idea of giving microcredits to somebody by myself.
lender.occupational_info: As a student I spend a lot of time in university, reading or in front of my computer. There's always something to do.

lender.name: Bønes Aires Invest
lender.loan_because: Because it is nice to help somebody who need funding. ... and if you give a man a fish you feed him for a day, but if you teach him how to fish he will be able to feed him self the rest of his life.

lender.name: Bjørn
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepeneur myself and I like to see people get an opportunity to start something up and then make it grow into something that can help them, and their surroundings, out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I compose, record and produce music. I then license the non-exclusive use of that music to companies who need music for presentations, videos, film, games, slideshows, websites and other media.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Someone needs it more than me...!

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help people and it's not anonymous, because I know who is getting the money.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: Its a fantastic idea to be able to help small businesses/families secure a better life for themselves and their own communities - through micro-loans and a hugh volunteer network.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Because I value and respect the hard work of inviduals who seek to gain self reliance in the face of staggering obstacles.
lender.occupational_info: I own an engineering consulting business that designs community infrastructure improvement projects, such as water treatment and sewage treatment facilities.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I admire those who build their business in difficult conditions.

lender.name: Kristian
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Thuy&Dan
lender.loan_because: We want to reach out a helping hand to people in need around the world !!!!!

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Helping people who want to help themselves works for all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people selling their homes and buying homes.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe we all need to share our resources equitably. Without a more balanced distribution of resources - economic, political, social, cultural - peace will be elusive!
lender.occupational_info: I am working to promote peace at all levels, through consumer education, promoting awareness of social justice issues, and environmental/sustainability education.

lender.name: Knut
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I develop web based software systems for a consultant company in Norway

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to make a big change with any size contribution.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do....
lender.occupational_info: I help keep the air we breath and water we drink clean

lender.name: Microstockgroup.com
lender.loan_because: It is important.
lender.occupational_info:
As a entrepreneur I understand the need for capital to get something started. Kiva provides a great opportunity connecting entrepreneurial spirits around the world.
Every yearly membership fee that Microstockgroup.com receives will first be sent to Kiva. Once the Kiva loan has been repaid, the membership fee will then go to support the microstockgroup website.

lender.name: Sombra
lender.loan_because: I'm pretty lucky, I have enough to live and I would like to help other people to live happier and with a better future

lender.name: Raul
lender.loan_because: They need it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: Educator

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to help others around the world, by investing in people's business, so they can have an oppertunity to make a living and increase their income:) Why not make the world better trough KIVA?
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: catherina
lender.loan_because: I think lending out money this way is the best way to be able to help people make a future for themselves. I also like the connection to the people I help by following their progress, and I like to see that it actually works! I tryed one loan to start with. Now that I see it works, I decided to put in 4 more loans around the world. I will keep doing so as i think Kiva is doing wonderful work here ! :-)

lender.name: Knut
lender.loan_because: It is my way of making the world a littlebit better place to live. How often do we spend money for things that we realy don't need, and put it away after a short time? I feel I get a lot more "interest" of lending money to people that realy need the money than spend it on worthless things. Kiva gives me the opportunity to help people around the world. For me is this a "penny" issue, but it can make such a huge difference in another's life.
lender.occupational_info: Working at the Norwegian Public Roads Administration

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can! I love the concept that people all around the world can get together an loan to others to make them successful. I especially like the opportunity to empower women who have established their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: As a software project manager, I am responsible for ensuring that our products are shipped on time, are of high quality and that I can report anything that prevents a high-quality, on-time release to our executives.

lender.name: Trond & Bente
lender.loan_because: I hope to give someone who is in need a chance in life.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like helping fellow entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I own a book publishing business.

lender.name: Joanie
lender.loan_because: I just spent 3 weeks in Africa helping in a small village in Malawi and realized how much a loan could help in their village. I will be recommending this site to them as well.
lender.occupational_info: I counsel people when they have emotional problems....loss, conflict, heartache.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Pelin
lender.loan_because: I feel that we are a community in the whole world and borders do not count...

lender.name: Nightengale
lender.loan_because: I believe this organization can get the funds directly to the individuals in need.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: even the smallest amount of money can make a difference. And instead of letting my money rot on a bank account, why shouldn't I just loan it to people who need it? Excactly.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently attending a german college and pursuing a Bachelors degree in telecommunications & computer science. At the same time I work for the Deutsche Telekom, which funds the college. So it combines work and study.

lender.name: Hector
lender.loan_because: To help them to reach their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I have two jobs, one is a supervisor for a transformer company the other with my wife we own a roofing company.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I have a lot to be grateful for and an obligation to share.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to have everything I need to survive. I want to share some of my good fortune with others.

lender.name: TIMOTHY
lender.loan_because: I run a snail farm and need to enlarge and be able to export it and also need to run a big cafe and bar together .
lender.occupational_info: Exciting

lender.name: Jessica & Tony
lender.loan_because: it is important to give to people and help their dreams come true. It is also important for underdeveloped countries to prosper and grow their economies.

lender.name: Nava
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance.

lender.name: Gretchen & Ray
lender.loan_because: We've been blessed with more than we need and want to share with others in a way that really empowers them to make better lives for themselves and their communities.

lender.name: allan
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by people who are striving to make a better life for their families and others by building their own businesses. I know this takes hard work, dedication and money. To be able to contribute to their enterprises is a privilege I take great pride in.
lender.occupational_info: We provide imaging services to Ad Agencies, designers, printers and others in the graphic arts community.

lender.name: Jarle
lender.loan_because:
I`d like to help others - and this really works!
If you have the opportunity to spend some money to help someone, don`t just think about it - DO IT!!

lender.name: Eleonore
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I believe we all benefit when we promote and seek equal or better opportunities for all, including under-served populations
lender.occupational_info: I direct compelling films, sometimes fictional, sometimes pieces of true narratives from around the globe that move and inspire action.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It gives an opportunity to someone to become self sustaining and possibly pay the loan forward to someone they know who needs financial support.
lender.occupational_info: fund raiser for juvenile diabetes

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: When I heard about this I thought it was such an amazing idea!
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for 2 major retail accounts in Canada where I manage the day to day business of having our products sold within their organization.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: It just makes good sense.

lender.name: Madeline
lender.loan_because: My microeconomics teacher in high school decided that our class should lend money for a microloan. After the course, I decided to continue by lending my own money. This organization makes me feel connected with the recipients of the loans. It's good to put a face to the name.
lender.occupational_info: Starting in September of 2009, I will be an undergraduate student at a university in the United States.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because:
Trevor's parents are loaning the money they are saving for his college education so that it can make the world a better place and help many people by the time he is ready to use it.
The social and spiritual returns on this investment are great. Thank you for giving us this opportunity to share our wealth responsibly, and for giving our son numerous examples of people who have worked hard to benefit their families and communities.
We wish you the best!

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that puts websites on the internet. My husband and I also belong to a Christian Ministry called Gospel Outreach NW that ministers to the motorcycle world.

lender.name: D-J
lender.loan_because: Giving is as natural as receiving.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a building that is a sacred space where people can go within through meditation and chanting.

lender.name: Allen
lender.occupation: a little bit of a lot of things
lender.loan_because: liberal guilt.
lender.occupational_info: I do mostly what they pay me for, which is sometimes related to information security and systems analysis.

lender.name: joelle
lender.loan_because: there are people out there who can make a dollar stretch far longer than i can.
lender.occupational_info: Supporting missions that will observe our solar system, our planet, and stellar systems within and beyond our own galaxy.

lender.name: Comedy on the Rox
lender.loan_because: We are gifted weekly with joy, fun, mirth and the removal of sorrow. These are the gifts we wish to share.
lender.occupational_info: We are a comedy room in Sydney Australia, run every week by comics.

lender.name: steve and wendy
lender.loan_because: this is a small--but meaningful--way to help others we would otherwise never encounter

lender.name: El and Bill
lender.loan_because: We believe we are all part of humankind and it is our responsibility to help each other when we can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher of 6 year old children and loved working with the young ones.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I am at a point in my life where I find myself truly blessed and it is only right to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital and take xrays of people who are hurt as a profession, but I enjoy being around good, giving people in all areas of my life.

lender.name: Denise and Mike
lender.loan_because: Money is energy and it's fun to watch it work.

lender.name: Matthew & Corrie
lender.loan_because: We believe in microfinance
lender.occupational_info: Studying in order to better serve others. Sisi ni mwanafunzi.

lender.name: Team 4
lender.loan_because: We want to give people an opportunity to improve their current situation. We hope that our loan will help expand the global economy and provide more job opportunities in the area in which we loan.
lender.occupational_info: We are four business students at Regis University, taking an International Finance course. In this course we are covering material including the growing trend of microlending and other aspects of foreign exchange markets. As part of this class we have been given the opportunity to lend to two entrepreneurs through Kiva to gain first hand experience with micro loans.

lender.name: Dizzydog
lender.loan_because: Want something good to happen? Do something good.

lender.name: Bernadette
lender.loan_because: How can you not help someone trying to help themselves and their relations!?
lender.occupational_info: I'm an executive recruiter working with organisations looking to source middle to senior level staff in the Asia Pacific Region

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: it is a way to make a big difference in someone else's life

lender.name: Blain
lender.loan_because: Everything is interconnected, so I think I'll help myself.

lender.name: Liis
lender.loan_because: If a stone is cast in water, a ripple is created. When enough ripples gather, a beautiful wave of energy is created.
lender.occupational_info: Changing fashion... Changing minds... I communicate through the media, lectures,writing and projects about the need for diversity in fashion, encouraging others - especially young women and girls - to appreciate the beauty in all of us.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: in a world of overwhelming global crises- cyclical poverty being one of them, Kiva is one solution that actually makes sense- the idea of being able to help people help themselves, again and again with one loan- there may be no greater way for a single person to make an impact!

lender.name: Elin
lender.loan_because: it's a privilege and a good way to contribute to sustainable development all over the world.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: It was a small loan that got me going again after health issues shut me down for awhile.
lender.occupational_info: I do sewing from home now.

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I build cool websites.

lender.name: Robinette
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those that are helping themselves.

lender.name: Bill in SF
lender.loan_because: We must all work to end poverty at home and thoughout the world – and continually strive to empower all women everywhere.

lender.name: Erling
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great idea to help people that want to make a better situation for themselves

lender.name: Kjell B
lender.loan_because: I belive in helping.

lender.name: Duong Quoc Viet
lender.loan_because: I want to help every body on the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm saling mobile in Vietnam.

lender.name: Mette
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good oportunity to support people in their initiatives.

lender.name: Michael & Christa
lender.occupation: Managing Partner Persist Global Wealth Management
lender.loan_because: We like to help people and if they repay we can help others. Together we can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Persist Global Wealth Management

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: i believe it will make a small difference - and so should you :-)
lender.occupational_info: i make web pages like kiva.org

lender.name: Anders

lender.name: Lars Gregorius
lender.loan_because: I believe this form of help is constructive and help people achieve the goals of their own choosing by their own effort. Lending is easy, building a business is tough and I’m impressed of the different initiatives from the Kiva entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: so little can go so far in changing a life. And one life is then an entire family, and then a community....
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital doing ultrasounds

lender.loan_because: I can and they need it.

lender.name: Sidsel
lender.loan_because: I can! We are all brothers and sisters!

lender.name: Tommy
lender.loan_because: Because I can. Also, I like the idea of helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: I think it is our duty, to make sure that people who are less fortuned still have a chance:)

lender.name: Jusu
lender.loan_because:
I want to set up a small scale printing business in Banjul
I am asking for a loan of Three Thousand Dollars to be repaid in 18 months
lender.occupational_info: I am an academic involved in teaching people who want to learn. I have been in the academic field for more than 20 years. A small scale printing business will enhance learning.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others
lender.occupational_info: I make carbide rotary cutting tools

lender.name: khm
lender.loan_because: I want to help those trying to establish an enterprise, become self reliant, be successful and have work/resources plus growth to provide well for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: Information Technology & Services

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in this world.

lender.name: JOHN
lender.loan_because: " GOD knows ! "

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help people.

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because:
I think it works when people try to built their own future. When they need some help to start and expand their enterprises, providing loans is a good way of helping them.
I prefer to lend to people in the poorest countries, so for example not to people in the United States of America.
lender.occupational_info:
developing computer systems kivafan@deboer.xs4all.nl
hobby: genealogy

lender.name: Advin BV Regio NO
lender.loan_because: we like to give chances to create your own life and changes
lender.occupational_info: We are a dutch engineering and consulting firm. Our employees have lunch at our office and pay their lunchmoney weekly - we donate 100 % of the revenues to charity and loans and sponsor the actual cost of the lunches out of the company's profits.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I raised the money with getting sponsorsing my New York Marathon in 2007. With the money raised we wanted to make adifference something KIVA realizes.
lender.occupational_info: Responsible for all commercial activities of IBM (ICT Business) in Benelux (Europe)

lender.name: Audhild
lender.loan_because: I have great respect for people who actively try to make a better life for themselves - they deserve the help they can get.

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: I care about people worldwide. We lived for some years in Bolivia so we have a special interest in Bolivians. Our dog, Whiskey, was born in El Alto, Bolivia and now resides with us in Colorado.
lender.occupational_info: I create functional pottery for everyday use.

lender.name: Joe & Monica
lender.loan_because: i could use the karma

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: It is always the little things that have the biggest impact. I firmly believe that "life is a gift and we should live every moment as a thank you note!" Helping others through Kiva is one way I show my gratitude and make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse and also fundraise for a local non-profit that serves the disabled in my community.

lender.name: Divina del-Sol
lender.loan_because: I am richly blessed. It is my joy and privilege to be an instrument of blessing by sharing my good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: All forms of consulting, networking, & empowerment.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I was in business for years and know how hard it is for people to get started. I was fortunate and want others to have the chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: retail furniture sales which I parlayed into owning of real estate investments.

lender.name: CoreTrek
lender.loan_because: We enjoy helping others and think this is a great way of contributing. We are currently seven people from CoreTrek: Frode Helgesen, Trond Ursin, Johan Fredrik Varen, John Michaelsen, Ole Bergesen, Espen Mandel and Aslak Evang
lender.occupational_info: We develop websites, portals, intranets and more, using php and other open source tools.

lender.name: Stein Erik og Monica
lender.loan_because: We loan because we would like to help people start with their own small business.

lender.name: Axel
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Wendy P.
lender.loan_because: I just paid off my own loans and I am very grateful that they were available to me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and learn, have amazing family and friends, and am very lucky.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: the world needs more $ and less poverty
lender.occupational_info: Educator

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference in the lives of others. I just want to help improve the world in anyway that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I go to a University, where I study to one day become a doctor. I also help teach children in a local elementary school.

lender.name: Kjell
lender.loan_because: This kind of help works!
lender.occupational_info: My time as retired is extremely exciting and interesting. Can do whatever I like!

lender.name: Amy's mom
lender.loan_because: We just like to help!

lender.name: simonidossos
lender.loan_because:
I want to see how kiva actually works.
I am more then sceptical that there is any future in lending money in this fashion and am afraid, that the lack of sustainability will one day not only leave some westerners without their "investments", but rather the microfinance sector in the third world still underdeveloped.
Microfinance as microcredit without microsaving is never a good idea. Please make sure you check on your MFIs's mixmarket profile. If they have no savers, don't fund them. They use your interest free money to destroy a local and sustainable solution.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting dreams and goals. I would not be who I am without my family and friends, and I have the chance to give back to the world what they have given to me.

lender.name: Roma
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: visual interpretations

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Family is family...wherever we are.

lender.name: Tove
lender.loan_because: It's good karma!

lender.name: Augustus
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a good life.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to help make a difference in the lives of people willing to put in hard work to get ahead in life.

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: This is truly a great program, helping those that want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Transcribe medical dictation from health care providers for hospital.

lender.name: Ladan
lender.loan_because: "Be the change that you want to see in the world." ~Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Manon
lender.loan_because: I want everybody to have the same oppertunities in life I had.

lender.name: Regine
lender.loan_because: ..a small gesture can make a big difference...
lender.occupational_info: I teach young adults nursing

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to give people te opportunity to keep their business and earn money for their family. Without us they might not have a good change.

lender.name: Astrid
lender.loan_because: I want to do my little part to end poverty
lender.occupational_info: I'm a High School teacher in Economics/Business

lender.name: Wouter
lender.loan_because: Microcredits actually helps people to improve their own lot.
lender.occupational_info: I improve Information System for large companies and Ministeries.

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: i watched the oprah winfrey show here in holland, and it really made me want to do this! :D
lender.occupational_info: i go to school in holland. you could call it high school.

lender.name: Antionetta
lender.loan_because: I enjoy assisting others and providing them with the necessary tools to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Human Service field. It has always been my passion to assist those in need. If you have faith in another person, that will motivate them to succeed.

lender.name: Ria
lender.loan_because: I like to do somethning for people who have less than me.
lender.occupational_info: i am retired

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: I want to make my contribution. I feel very privilaged in my own life, and this is a simple way to share some of my own good.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Lending is easy, and the right thing to do. Microfinance can greatly increase the quality of life in most places around the world.

lender.name: Bala
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have with people, who need the most.
lender.occupational_info: People development manager in a company.

lender.name: Mihaela
lender.loan_because: I want to do something for people less fortunate than me!
lender.occupational_info: I come from Romania where I was a company-lawyer. In Holland I am translator and I teach Romanian language to Duch people.

lender.name: anne
lender.loan_because: When I started my business I was very lucky - I had the capital needed. It's tough and very hard work to start and build a business - if you don't have the capital, then that's another head ache. Think this is a great way to help take away one of the challenges of being an entrepreneur. Hope the lending limit is removed soon.
lender.occupational_info: My company does what is called business communication. This means we make marketing brochures, advertisements, financial reports and other communication, such as websites, for our clients so they can send or give them to interested people, like shareholders.

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: It is a start to a better world. To awknowledge every human being in the world, where all is shared equally.

lender.name: Jan Maarten
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Pieter
lender.loan_because: I want to give hard working people the chance to make their dreams come true.

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: historically, access to finance has been a major driver behind socio-economic development.

lender.name: Vil Marie
lender.loan_because: Every body needs help and if I can give them help then that gives me hope that I might get one step closer to filling my dream of becoming an enterprenauer.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and write code for internet web pages.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: It's a fantastic and easy way to really help someone with her or his business

lender.name: Renee Beneteau
lender.loan_because: giving is contagious ...
lender.occupational_info: A CFRE with 20+ years of innovating for good.

lender.name: Ivo
lender.loan_because: it's the best way of helping .

lender.name: Jean-Louis
lender.loan_because: In spite of the fact that my overall income, having a heart disease, is not enough to live, and to much to die (western standards), there's always some money left to be able to get someone else in drive- position.
lender.occupational_info: I am in park- position because of a heart disease. Employers just squeezed the last bit of energy out of me, had to be in kick-down position always so I ran dry on oil and I got kicked out. That's the way 'developed' countries like the Netherlands treat their working force.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is my feeling that we are all one, walking the same path towards the same goal. It's our love and support for one another that makes it possible to endure. Helping people to succeed is the path to being successful yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Business people how to speak business English so that they can succeed in their jobs. My students are all foreign, and native Dutch, adults learning English as a second language. Being that I'm an American living in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, I interact with people from all over the world, and it's a wonderful experience to live and teach abroad.

lender.name: Rob en Truus
lender.loan_because: Good initiative and we love Africa. we visit it as often as we can.
lender.occupational_info: Buiding supervisor now retired,My wife is still working on a school as aministrationworker.

lender.name: Shaun
lender.loan_because: it is the least I can do
lender.occupational_info: Network operations manager for online mystery shopping community

lender.name: Cuauhtemoc
lender.loan_because: Soy una persona discapacitada y no encuentro empleo asi que tengo un pequeño taller en mi casa donde fabrico zapatillas de ballet,sin embargo no tengo la maquinaria suficiente para esto necesito 1,200 dolares para comprar maquinaria y equipo y armar mi taller de fabricacion de zapatillas de ballet
lender.occupational_info: Hago zapatillas de ballet, para bailarinas, estudiantes y artistas de ballet de fama internacional, tengo experiencia de mas de 10 años

lender.name: Ragnhild
lender.loan_because: - I think the world in general is unbearably unfair, but microfinance is a fair way to do a little bit of something about it. Every little action counts. - I run my own little one-woman-business and feel somewhat related to the kiva-entrepreneurs. - When the nations of my part of the world still are exploiting others by claiming their legitime or illegitime loans repaid with interest, then the least I can do is to make a couple of interest-free loans myself.
lender.occupational_info: I do editing, proofreading and translations mainly for publishing houses, and also give private Norwegian lessons to immigrants.

lender.name: kristine
lender.loan_because: for the first time I feel I can help somebody developing their business or caring for their family and I actually know where my money goes to.

lender.name: Tomek
lender.loan_because: It allows me to help someone who needs my help - and it's so simple!
lender.occupational_info: My role is to facilitate personal development of people in the organisation I work for.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: Passion. Remember, you could just lend the same money a month, what you spend on coffee a day.

lender.name: Rodolfo
lender.loan_because: The best way to stimulate people in selfsupporting themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepeneur in supporting my neighbours/brothers to develop theirselves to live an humanity live with their families. *Foto standing with a Haitian boy at the boarder river with the Dom. Rep.*

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: God has provided.
lender.occupational_info: Easing the pain and hardships of others.

lender.name: yvan
lender.loan_because: let's give a chance to each other , we are just part of a chain , don't let it breakdown
lender.occupational_info: i am a 49 years old hairdresser with a wife and two children

lender.name: anja
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around
lender.occupational_info: Very Busy

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I believe the best way to help people world-wide is to help people earn a living in their own way.
lender.occupational_info: I design electronic products such as computers.

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have opportunity. I loan through kiva because it goes directly to the receiver. Some charities take out 40% or more of a donation.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers. I check that software works right.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to be poor and I love helping people and making a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I wash window for people. I also help people market their businesses using the internet.

lender.name: Martinka
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: Karel
lender.loan_because: After been to Ecuador you see that a small amount can make a big difference

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Money talks - period.

lender.name: PMP
lender.loan_because: To help the poor help themselves.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: This is such an easy way to make a real difference for real people--one person or group at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I represent individuals and companies to navigate the legal system.

lender.name: Jenjer & Gerco
lender.occupation: Jenjer - Jewelry & Web Designs/ Gerco- Agriculture
lender.loan_because: I ( Jenjer) was at a place years ago that I needed others to help me....Now that I am able to help others...well it makes my heart smile with every chance I find to give to someone else :) I (Gerco) I love to loan through KIVA, because it will help other people to make a change in their lives. It stimulates them as much as myself to put in more effort in our everyday work and activities.
lender.occupational_info: I ( Jenjer) create jewelry designs from beads bought around the world..I also create small web sites for companies that need it but do not have a lot of money to spend...It's a joy giving to others. I (Gerco) work with a company that develop and sells coco fibre products for the Horticultural market. Most of our products are produced in India and Sri Lanka.

lender.name: Tage
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a 'small' difference. If my small loans can help somebody its worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: It's a practical way to help.

lender.loan_because: I'm lucky living in Norway

lender.loan_because: I want connect to people around the world and support individuals who have the vision and courage to work towards making their dreams come true!

lender.occupational_info: I sell photos to stock agencies and I do commercial photography.

lender.name: Meta
lender.loan_because: You - the lender - are a great person and you, like all people, have the right to receive a credit to build or expand your business. I wish you all the best and I believe in you!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an MBA student - I study business administration in the USA.
